description: The last time I saw Mikey he was tied up on my couch, where I managed to worship his feet and get him off. He loved it, of course, and I think he took to being tied up because I talked him into being bound to the tickle chair and tormented this time around. The look of fear on Mikey’s face is very evident and it is a fear that is well-grounded. You see, Mikey is extremely ticklish. So much so that even just tickling the inside of his thighs had him squirming around. By the time I had his shoes off to torment his size 11 feet Mikey was nothing more than a well-tickled puddle of hilarity!
title: Mikey Tickle Tormented In The Tickle Chair
